item.description:
Night Life Orchestra (NLO)

"The “Night Life Orchestra” has been in existence since 1988, performing for crowds of all ages, primarily in Rhode Island, Massachusetts, and Connecticut. Consisting of a minimum of thirteen musicians, “NLO” provides a classic big band sound. Our repertoire includes hits from artists such as Count Basie, Duke Ellington, Frank Sinatra, James Brown, and Van Morrison. We’ve performed for serving U.S. Presidents and the neighbors in the local parks. In 2007 we opened the season for Providence's “Water Fire” at the main dance stage, to a very receptive crowd." http://www.nightlifeo...

When: 6:30 PM - 7:30 PM
Where: Porch and lawn

Admission:
Museum Members: Free
Non-Members Adults: $5
Non-Member Families: $10
Children age five and under: free
item.how_to_find_us: I will be on the lawn. Call me at 1.440.867.6156
item.name: PM Picnic (with live music)
